rows.label: qst720104_msg0003
rows.name:
I feel a lot of ether.
We'll probably find some good stuff here.

rows.label: qst720104_msg0004
rows.name:
Oh, so the miasma forms easily
because the ether is so rich here.

rows.label: qst720104_msg0005
rows.name:
Exactly. If we find any more ether
miasma on our way, I'd like to ask
Kasumi to purify it.

rows.label: qst720104_msg0006
rows.name: Of course! Leave it to me.

rows.label: qst720104_msg0007
rows.name: We're lucky to have you, Kasumi.

rows.label: qst720104_msg0008
rows.name:
Hey! Are you saying
a brute like me couldn't handle it?

rows.label: qst720104_msg0009
rows.name: That's not what I meant, Hikari.

rows.label: qst720104_msg0010
rows.name:
You're the only Blade I have,
so you've never had a chance
to work together with other Blades.

rows.label: qst720104_msg0011
rows.name:
If you travel with Kasumi and Shin,
you might learn new ways
to use your power.

rows.label: qst720104_msg0012
rows.name: And that would make me happy...

rows.label: qst720104_msg0013
rows.name: Is that what you were hoping for?

rows.label: qst720104_msg0014
rows.name:
I-I can't promise anything!
But I'll... try...
